name: Jaipur
shortDescription: The Pink City, famous for magnificent palaces, forts, and vibrant Rajasthani culture.
description: Jaipur, the capital of Rajasthan, is famously known as the Pink City due to its distinctive pink-colored buildings. This royal city is home to magnificent forts, opulent palaces, and colorful bazaars. Jaipur forms part of the Golden Triangle tourist circuit and offers a glimpse into India's regal past.

topAttractions.name: Amber Fort
topAttractions.description: Majestic hilltop fort with elephant rides and stunning architecture

topAttractions.name: City Palace
topAttractions.description: Royal residence with museums showcasing Rajput heritage

topAttractions.name: Jantar Mantar
topAttractions.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site, astronomical observatory with giant instruments

topAttractions.name: Nahargarh Fort
topAttractions.description: Hill fort offering panoramic views of the Pink City

localFood: Dal Baati Churma - Traditional Rajasthani dish
Ghewar - Sweet dessert made during festivals
Pyaaz Kachori - Fried pastry with onion filling
travelTips: Book palace hotels in advance for royal experience
Hire a guide to learn about fort histories
Shop at Johari Bazaar for jewelry and textiles
Try elephant rides at Amber Fort early morning
Attend cultural shows at Chokhi Dhani village resort
